edu.wsu.KepheraSimulator
Class WorldDrawManager

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--edu.wsu.KepheraSimulator.WorldDrawManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class WorldDrawManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

A WorldDrawManager class provides the main thread to run the simulator engine. This thread manages drawing routines, controller threads, various book keeping and shared data.

Method Detail

getDisplayMode

protected java.lang.String getDisplayMode()
Access the value for the current sensor label display mode for GUI sensor value updates. Legal display modes are "distance", "light", and "disable".

Returns:
current display mode

setDisplayMode

protected void setDisplayMode(java.lang.String mode)
Change the value for the current sensor label display mode for GUI sensor value updates.

Parameters:
mode - display mode ("distance", "light", or "disable")

clearWorldImage

protected void clearWorldImage()
Sets all values in the 500 x 500 world image matrix to zeros.

createWorldImage

protected void createWorldImage()
Sets values in the 500 x 500 world image matrix to appropriate values based on the presence and position of user placed objects (and the static outer walls). The matrix is simply another representation of the robot arena that uses object id numbers at pixel locations where objects are present.

reInitialize

protected void reInitialize()
Resets appropriate data before starting the WorldDrawManager thread.

startPlayback

protected void startPlayback()
Starts routine used when user plays a previously recorded file.

stopPlayback

protected void stopPlayback()
Stops playing a previously recorded file.

startSimulator

protected void startSimulator()
Starts the main simulation thread, which runs the robot based on the currently loaded controller and generated sensor values.

stopSimulator

protected void stopSimulator()
Terminates the main simulation thread, halting the controller execution.

Parameters:
level - new distance sensor sensitivity level
